item.title: Portal of Pi
item.dc:creator: Cerberus
item.description:
Portal is good,but I don t know is it better than whonix physical isolation
It is a somewhat similar concept. Using Portal of Pi instead of a physically isolated Whonix Gateway, you need to configure stream isolation yourself - see https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stream_Isolation

Also read both https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TransparentProxy (especially the “Anonymizing Middlebox” part) and https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorifyHOWTO/IsolatingProxy
